title: ‘Someone Has To Be At The Top:’ Pogačar Slaps Back at Critics of Tour de France Dominance
content:
'Imagine a sprinter not contesting a sprint stage just to let someone else win': Pogačar's winning ways trigger debate over Cannibal-like supremacy.

Read the full article at ‘Someone Has To Be At The Top:’ Pogačar Slaps Back at Critics of Tour de France Dominance on Velo.
author: ahood
